text: "Again" is a 2000 song by Lenny Kravitz. It was the only single from his 2000 greatest hits album Greatest Hits and went to number 4 in the United States and Poland, number 1 in Italy and Iceland, number 5 in New Zealand and Croatia, number 2 in Portugal, number 10 in Spain, number 25 in the Netherlands and number 16 in Finland. It won a Grammy Award in 2001. ==Track listings== Australian CD single # "Again" – 3:52 # "Fly Away" (live) – 5:45 # "Always on the Run" (live) – 12:06 # "Are You Gonna Go My Way" (live) – 5:41 # "Again" (Stankonia remix feat. Outkast—clean version) – 4:09 # "Again" (Stankonia remix feat.
